description: This Python script demonstrates how to implement an Agentic Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system with reasoning capabilities. It sets up a knowledge base from a URL, configures an agent with specific models and tools, and runs a sample query to showcase the system.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base loaded with documents from specified URLs.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: Represents the LanceDB vector database used for storing embeddings.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents the agent that interacts with the knowledge base and models.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Represents the Anthropic Claude model used as the language model.

classes.name: CohereEmbedder
classes.description: Embeds text using Cohere's embedding models.

classes.name: CohereReranker
classes.description: Re-ranks search results using Cohere's reranking models.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: Provides reasoning tools to enhance the agent's capabilities.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the agent's response to a query, with options for streaming and reasoning display.
